meta.title: Boosteroid Optimizer Plus | Force 4K & Upscaling for Cloud Gaming
meta.description: Unlock the full potential of your Boosteroid cloud gaming experience. Force 4K resolution, smart upscaling, video enhancement filters, and ultra-low latency on any monitor.

hero.title: Boosteroid Optimizer Plus
hero.subtitle: Force 4K ‚Ä¢ Smart Upscaling ‚Ä¢ Video Filters ‚Ä¢ Zero VRAM Leak
hero.description: Transform your Boosteroid cloud gaming experience with smart resolution scaling, advanced video enhancement, and ultra-low latency optimization. Works on any monitor.

features.title: Features
features.subtitle: Premium Features
features.description: Everything you need to unleash the full potential of Boosteroid cloud gaming.

deviceProfiling.title: Smart Device Profiling
deviceProfiling.description: Auto-detects CPU cores, RAM, network speed and screen ratio. Classifies your device as Low-End, Mid-Range or High-End for optimal settings.

resolutionDetector.title: Smart Resolution Detector
resolutionDetector.description: Generates custom resolutions (1080p/2K/4K) aligned to your exact screen ratio: 16:9, 21:9, 32:9 and non-standard displays. Uses native resolution by default.

presets.title: 5 Pro Presets
presets.description: Default, Cinematic, Competitive, Comfort, Perfect Quality. Each preset tunes filters for different gaming scenarios. All presets are OFF by default.

videoFilters.title: Advanced Video Filters
videoFilters.description: USM & CAS sharpening, clarity, denoising, anti-banding, vibrance, gamma, exposure. Organized in Safe, Light, Balanced, Ultra tiers.

adaptiveQuality.title: Adaptive Quality
adaptiveQuality.description: 5 filter tiers (OFF/Safe/Light/Balanced/Ultra) that auto-adjust based on your hardware. Dynamic maxFiltersActive limit per device tier.

codecSelector.title: Smart Codec Selector
codecSelector.description: Probes MediaCapabilities API to auto-select best codec: AV1 > HEVC > VP9 > H.264. Hardware-accelerated decoding preferred.

lowLatency.title: Low Latency Mode
lowLatency.description: Optimizes WebRTC receiver with playoutDelayHint for minimal input lag. Targets 12ms latency with automatic jitter buffer tuning.

svgFilterPipeline.title: SVG Filter Pipeline
svgFilterPipeline.description: GPU-accelerated SVG filters for USM sharpening, contrast matrix, color correction. Runs on GPU with minimal CPU impact.

zeroFlicker.title: Zero-Flicker Bootstrap
zeroFlicker.description: Applies video filters at startup without visible flash. Uses requestIdleCallback for zero micro-freezes and smooth initialization.

dashboard.title: Dashboard Widget
dashboard.description: Floating control panel to select your preferred resolution and refresh the page to apply changes. Simple and effective.

streamInterceptor.title: Stream Interceptor
streamInterceptor.description: Optional module that intercepts config requests to force hardware decoding and push higher quality settings.

step1.title: Install Tampermonkey
step1.description: Add the Tampermonkey extension to your browser. It's free and takes 10 seconds.

step2.title: Install the Script
step2.description: Click the button below to install Boosteroid Optimizer Plus from GreasyFork.

step3.title: Launch Boosteroid
step3.description: Open Boosteroid.com and start any game. The script auto-activates!

q1.question: Do I need a 4K monitor to use this?
q1.answer: No! The Smart Resolution Detector generates custom resolutions (1080p, 2K, 4K) aligned to your screen's exact aspect ratio. Boosteroid renders at higher resolution, then downscales for sharper output even on a 1080p display.

q2.question: What are the 6 Presets available?
q2.answer: ‚ë† OFF (disabled by default) ‚ë° Default (balanced) ‚ë¢ Cinematic (max filters) ‚ë£ Competitive (minimal processing) ‚ë§ Comfort (eye-care) ‚ë• Perfect Quality (4K + max enhancement). Filters are OFF by default - you choose which preset to activate!

q3.question: Is this safe / will I get banned?
q3.answer: This script only works client-side in your browser. It doesn't modify game files or Boosteroid servers. Zero risk of bans. Think of it like adjusting monitor settings or GPU driver sharpening.

q4.question: Why does my FPS drop with filters enabled?
q4.answer: Heavy filters (Clarity, Denoise, Deband) are GPU-intensive. Enable Performance Mode via Ctrl+Alt+P or dashboard. The script auto-adjusts filter intensity based on your device tier.

q5.question: Which codec does the script use?
q5.answer: Auto-selects the best codec your hardware supports: AV1 (best) > HEVC (great) > H.264 (fallback). This runs silently on first load. AV1 provides ~30% better quality at same bitrate.

q6.question: How do I control the optimizer?
q6.answer: A control panel appears on the Boosteroid dashboard with presets OFF by default. It's up to you to enable the toggles: Adaptive Quality, quick presets, and Performance Mode. Select your resolution and refresh the page to apply.
